OOC: Italic is his thoughts   Italic underline is emphasis

::Cygnar::
       He smirks knowingly.  It was a plan they had used before successfully, 
his plan.  It doesn't matter, all that matters is the goal.  "Sir, I believe 
we will be best served by pitting Megatron against the Tripreds.  The only 
slight snag is the Maximals.  I'm going to go work something out with them.  
They will stay out of the picture for the time being."

--part1_17b.afe2b3b.2a5e783a_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
